text: Pierre de Barrigue de Montvallon, known as Piem, (12 November 1923 – 12 November 2020) was a French cartoonist. He was born in Saint-Étienne, France. Many of his works appeared on French newspapers. They mainly appeared for Le Figaro, Le Point and La Croix. His career began in 1947. Piem died in Notre- Dame-d'Oé, France on 12 November 2020, his 97th birthday. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French cartoonists Category:People from Saint-Étienne
